original_title: Gladesmen: The Last of the Sawgrass Cowboys
overview: Gladesmen is a feature-length documentary about the government’s ban on Florida’s iconic airboats in much of the Everglades. The measure is part of the world’s largest effort to repair a damaged ecosystem, a vast river of grass that has been ravaged by more than a century of development, pollution, and other environmental degradation.
title: Gladesmen: The Last of the Sawgrass Cowboys
